title: Spec shift and fallback contract
description: Update architecture docs to formalize local resident daemon behavior and explicitly define daemon-unavailable direct-scan fallback as an intentional product behavior.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: update VISION.md and IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md with daemon lifecycle and explicit daemon-unavailable direct-scan behavior.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Updated VISION.md and IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md with daemon lifecycle and explicit daemon-unavailable direct-scan behavior.

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: VISION.md and IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md describe daemon lifecycle, files-as-source-of-truth, and explicit fallback semantics.
